column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH –------ A woman has died after being taken to hospital following what is thought to be a phone snatch robbery on April 07
column4: 2020 at about 8:20 pm in Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang 3
column5: Phnom Penh.------The victim was named as Liv Lai Hui
column7: was from Kampong Thom.------Two unidentified male suspects
column9: were riding a black Honda dream behind the victim along 310
column10: and attempted to snatch her phone. She fell from her motorcycle and was sent to Calmette Hospital
column11: where she later died of her injuries.------Her body was handed over to the family for a ceremony at Toul Sangke Pagoda in Sangkat Toul Sangke
